text: Frank Joseph Morze (March 21, 1933 in Gardner, Massachusetts – May 28, 2006) was a center in the National Football League for the San Francisco 49ers. Morze attended Boston College. He died May 28, 2006 after a long battle with heart disease. title: Frank Morze
